title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work - your new best friend for comfort and relaxation! This versatile foot stool is not only perfect for your home office setup but also ideal for use in cars, planes, and any other space where you need a break.

Crafted with high-quality foam wrapped in a durable black fabric cover, this footrest boasts an ergonomic design that will support correct sitting habits while providing relief from back, lumbar, and knee pain. Measuring 16.9 inches by 11.2 inches and standing at a height of 2 inches for the lower layer, it offers ample space to rest your feet or prop them up behind your knees.

But wait, there's more! The BlissTrends Foot Rest is adjustable, allowing you to tailor its height to your specific needs using convenient magic tapes and a secure zipper closure. Its non-slip design ensures stability underfoot, while the removable and machine-washable cover makes cleaning a breeze.

Experience the difference with BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work - the must-have accessory for anyone seeking comfort, support, and style in their daily life!

Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work - your ultimate solution for comfort and relaxation! This versatile foot stool is not only perfect for your office setup but also ideal for use in your car, home, or even on an airplane.

Our Black foot rest boasts a sleek design with high-quality foam core, ensuring long-lasting durability. The lower layer measures 16.9 inches by 11.2 inches and is just 2.0 inches high, making it compact enough to fit easily under your desk. The upper layer features an impressive thickness of 3.7 inches for optimal support.

But what sets our foot rest apart is its adjustable height! With the help of magic tapes and a convenient zipper mechanism, you can effortlessly change the height to best suit your needs - whether you're looking for relief under your feet or behind your knees. And when it comes time to clean up, simply remove the washable cover using the zipper and toss it in the washing machine!

Our non-slip design ensures a stable base, while the ergonomic construction supports correct sitting habits, alleviating discomfort and pain in your back, lumbar, and knee areas. The BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work is truly an essential accessory that will transform the way you work - or travel! Try one today and discover a new level of comfort and productivity.

But what sets the BlissTrends Foot Rest apart is its adjustable height. Easily change the position with our convenient magic tapes and zipper mechanism, ensuring a custom fit for any user. Crafted from high-quality foam with a durable fabric cover and featuring a non-slip design on the bottom, this footrest is both ergonomic and stylish. Say goodbye to back, lumbar, or knee pain and improve your sitting habits with the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work. Order yours today!

**Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work: Your Ultimate Comfort Solution**
